page.title: 13TRANSPORT
page.content: The main users of the roads for transporting goods in Darley Dale are vans and lorries.Roughly sixty lorries and vans passed throughin a morning hour. The roads are not used a lot by everyday people walking to work, most people go to work by car. About a two-hundred and fifty-six cars are driven to work in the rush hour. The minor roads are used by people going to and from home. ------------------------------ There were not many pedestrians in this area and the only people we met were either in a hurry or were simply doing their shopping. One pedestrian said she had no car and that she enjoyed walking in this area although she thought that the pavements could be better.She was on her way to Meadow Stores in Darley Dale.
